name: creative-tech-dj-twitter-bot
description: X Premium+ posting bot for DJs and Creative-Tech users with web dashboard

scripts.test-audio: node -e "const { ArweaveAudioClient } = require('./src/lib/ArweaveAudioClient'); const client = new ArweaveAudioClient(); client.generateAudioClip(30).then(console.log).catch(console.error);"
scripts.test-video: node -e "const { ArweaveVideoGenerator } = require('./src/lib/ArweaveVideoGenerator'); const generator = new ArweaveVideoGenerator(); generator.generateVideoWithAudio(30).then(console.log).catch(console.error);"
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Post-install script completed' && node -e "try { const { execSync } = require('child_process'); execSync('ffmpeg -version', { stdio: 'ignore' }); console.log('✅ System FFmpeg available'); } catch(e) { console.log('⚠️ System FFmpeg not found:', e.message); }"

author: Creative Tech DJ
